SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to NovaStream?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {above} NovaStream in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total subscription revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total subscription revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {OracleFeed}.

NC.A: The total subscription revenue in 1964 was {higher} than in 1965.

NC.Q: Was the total Subscription Revenue in 1967 higher or lower than in 1974?

NC.A: The average total subscription revenue between 1957 and 1970 was {lower} than between 1952 and 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1974, was the average total Subscription Revenue higher or lower than between 1972 and 1973?
NC.A: The average total subscription revenue between 1956 and 1974 was {lower} than between 1972 and 1973.

MSR.A: {Starburst Online} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
